snippet: The lower house of Parliament approved a plan to return billions of dollars worth of property that was confiscated from churches by previous Communist governments.
abstract: Czech Republic's lower house of Parliament approves plan to return billions of dollars worth of property that was confiscated from churches by previous Communist governments, overriding veto by upper house.
lead_paragraph: The lower house of Parliament approved a plan to return billions of dollars worth of property that was confiscated from churches by previous Communist governments.

headline.main: Czech Republic: Church Restitution Plan Advances
headline.print_headline: Czech Republic: Church Restitution Plan Advances
